entry.data:
MOSTLY CLEAR
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
LOCALLY HEAVY RAINFALL POSSIBLE IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

SHOWERS WITH THUNDERSTORMS LIKELY IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH, BECOMING SOUTHWEST 5 TO 10 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
WEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
NORTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 50S

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING, THEN PARTLY CLOUDY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS AROUND 80
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT
